snippet: Chipper Jones, who made a career out of pounding Mets pitching, reflects on the Mets and their fans in his farewell visit to Queens.
abstract: Atlanta Braves defeat New York Mets, 3-0; Mets fans salute Braves third baseman Chipper Jones, who is retiring at season's end.
lead_paragraph: Chipper Jones, who made a career out of pounding Mets pitching, reflects on the Mets and their fans in his farewell visit to Queens.

headline.seo: Mets Honor Rival Chipper Jones, Who Returns the Love
headline.main: Mets Honor a Longtime Rival, Who Returns the Love
headline.print_headline: Mets Honor a Longtime Rival, Who Returns the Love
